content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <?xml-stylesheet type="text/xsl" href="/xsl/oairepository/oai2.xsl.v1.0" ?> <OAI-PMH xmlns="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/OAI-PMH.xsd"> <responseDate>2015-03-12T22:01:19Z</responseDate><request verb="ListRecords" set="user-dcc-rdm-2014" metadataPrefix="oai_dc">http://zenodo.org/oai2d</request><ListRecords> <record><header><identifier>oai:zenodo.org:10711</identifier><datestamp>2014-07-01T11:00:27Z</datestamp><setSpec>openaire</setSpec><setSpec>user-dcc-rdm-2014</setSpec><setSpec>user-zenodo</setSpec></header><metadata><oai_dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:oai_dc="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd">   <dc:creator>Whyte, Angus</dc:creator>   <dc:creator>Sisu, Diana</dc:creator>   <dc:title>Results of the Digital Curation Centre 2014 RDM Survey- Briefing 1</dc:title>   <dc:date>2014-06-30</dc:date>   <dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject>   <dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/10711</dc:identifier>   <dc:identifier>           doi:10.5281/zenodo.10711</dc:identifier>   <dc:description><p>A report from the survey, first provided to the respondents in April 2014. The reports addresses the following questions:-</p>  <p>What was this survey aiming to achieve?</p>  <p>How was the survey undertaken?</p>  <p>Who responded?</p>  <p>Who is taking the lead in delivering RDM?</p>  <p>How are researchers involved?</p>  <p>What factors are driving development of RDM?</p>  <p>What are the obstacles?</p></dc:description>   <dc:rights>         info:eu-repo/semantics/openAccess       </dc:rights>   <dc:type>       info:eu-repo/semantics/article     </dc:type> </oai_dc:dc> </metadata></record><record><header><identifier>oai:zenodo.org:10712</identifier><datestamp>2014-07-01T11:00:27Z</datestamp><setSpec>openaire</setSpec><setSpec>user-dcc-rdm-2014</setSpec><setSpec>user-zenodo</setSpec></header><metadata><oai_dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:oai_dc="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd">   <dc:creator>Whyte, Angus</dc:creator>   <dc:title>Results of the Digital Curation Centre 2014 RDM Survey Pre-\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd\ufffdrelease Briefing 2,</dc:title>   <dc:date>2014-06-30</dc:date>   <dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject>   <dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/10712</dc:identifier>   <dc:identifier>           doi:10.5281/zenodo.10712</dc:identifier>   <dc:description><p>The 2nd of 3 Briefing papers giving results of the DCC survey, originally released to survey respondents on 1st May 2014. The report outlines:</p>  <p>How far have institutions progressed towards developing RDM policy?</p>  <p>How far have institutions got in implementing their policies?</p>  <p>When will institutions be able to provide for long-term access?</p>  <p>What external guidance and support is needed now?</p>  <p>What shared services are appropriate?</p></dc:description>   <dc:rights>         info:eu-repo/semantics/openAccess       </dc:rights>   <dc:type>       info:eu-repo/semantics/article     </dc:type> </oai_dc:dc> </metadata></record><record><header><identifier>oai:zenodo.org:10713</identifier><datestamp>2014-07-01T11:00:27Z</datestamp><setSpec>user-zenodo</setSpec><setSpec>user-dcc-rdm-2014</setSpec><setSpec>openaire</setSpec></header><metadata><oai_dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:oai_dc="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd">   <dc:creator>Whyte, Angus</dc:creator>   <dc:title>DCC Research Data Management Survey 2014 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdFrom Strategy to Action\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd Responses on Storage and Resourcing Questions</dc:title>   <dc:date>2014-06-30</dc:date>   <dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject>   <dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/10713</dc:identifier>   <dc:identifier>           doi:10.5281/zenodo.10713</dc:identifier>   <dc:description><p>The 3rd of 3 Briefing reports from the DCC 2014 survey on Research Data Management in UK Higher Education Institutions. Results are included on the following questions:</p>  <p>How does or will your institution allocate storage for research data?</p>  <p>How much &#39;free at point of use&#39; storage is currently included in any quota?</p>  <p>How much &#39;free at point of use&#39; storage do you expect your institution will be providing per quota by May 2015?</p>  <p>What has been funded for your institution, and from which sources?</p>  <p>What proportion of overall staffing (FTE) for RDM do you expect to be resourced by restructuring existing roles?</p>  <p>What are the current staffing levels for RDM services in your institution?</p>  <p>What staffing for RDM services do you expect there to be by May 2015?</p></dc:description>   <dc:rights>         info:eu-repo/semantics/openAccess       </dc:rights>   <dc:type>       info:eu-repo/semantics/article     </dc:type> </oai_dc:dc> </metadata></record><record><header><identifier>oai:zenodo.org:10715</identifier><datestamp>2014-07-01T12:24:35Z</datestamp><setSpec>user-dcc-rdm-2014</setSpec><setSpec>openaire_data</setSpec><setSpec>user-zenodo</setSpec></header><metadata><oai_dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:oai_dc="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd">   <dc:creator>Whyte, Angus</dc:creator>   <dc:title>DCC RDM2014 Survey Responses by Institutional Research Income</dc:title>   <dc:date>2014-06-30</dc:date>   <dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject>   <dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/10715</dc:identifier>   <dc:identifier>           doi:10.5281/zenodo.10715</dc:identifier>   <dc:description><p>Responses downloaded from Bristol Online Survey, with analysis in Excel. Responses have been anonymised.</p></dc:description>   <dc:rights>         info:eu-repo/semantics/openAccess       </dc:rights>   <dc:type>       info:eu-repo/semantics/article     </dc:type> </oai_dc:dc> </metadata></record><record><header><identifier>oai:zenodo.org:10717</identifier><datestamp>2014-07-01T12:24:35Z</datestamp><setSpec>openaire_data</setSpec><setSpec>user-zenodo</setSpec><setSpec>user-dcc-rdm-2014</setSpec></header><metadata><oai_dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:oai_dc="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd">   <dc:creator>Whyte, Angus</dc:creator>   <dc:title>DCC RDM 2014 Survey Responses by Respondent's Role</dc:title>   <dc:date>2014-06-30</dc:date>   <dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject>   <dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/10717</dc:identifier>   <dc:identifier>           doi:10.5281/zenodo.10717</dc:identifier>   <dc:description><p>Responses analysed according to the respondents self-identified affiliation to service unit, e.g. Library, Research office, IT</p></dc:description>   <dc:rights>         info:eu-repo/semantics/openAccess       </dc:rights>   <dc:type>       info:eu-repo/semantics/article     </dc:type> </oai_dc:dc> </metadata></record><record><header><identifier>oai:zenodo.org:10718</identifier><datestamp>2014-07-01T12:24:35Z</datestamp><setSpec>user-dcc-rdm-2014</setSpec><setSpec>openaire_data</setSpec><setSpec>user-zenodo</setSpec></header><metadata><oai_dc:dc xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/" xmlns:oai_dc="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc/ http://www.openarchives.org/OAI/2.0/oai_dc.xsd">   <dc:creator>Whyte, Angus</dc:creator>   <dc:title>DCC RDM 2014 Survey Responses - Deduplicated</dc:title>   <dc:date>2014-06-30</dc:date>   <dc:subject>cc-by</dc:subject>   <dc:identifier>http://zenodo.org/record/10718</dc:identifier>   <dc:identifier>           doi:10.5281/zenodo.10718</dc:identifier>   <dc:description><p>Responses de-duplicated and analysed on questions about current and planned storage, staffing and resourcing of Research Data Management services.</p></dc:description>   <dc:rights>         info:eu-repo/semantics/openAccess       </dc:rights>   <dc:type>       info:eu-repo/semantics/article     </dc:type> </oai_dc:dc> </metadata></record></ListRecords> </OAI-PMH>
